column5: Has anyone fished Badesdawa Lake recently? It's been about 25 years since we were last there and we only lasted one day. The water was low and the weeds high and we just could not make any headway what with weeds overtaking the prop every little bit. Years before it was a good fishing lake.

We camped there last year on the way home from a trip further north. We didn't fish but there were several campers set up that had boats and were fishing. So I would guess it was good, I know it's a favorite of locals for camping and fishing.
